# Exciting News: Conquer the Hill 2024 is Here! ![üåÑ](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f304/72.png){alt="üåÑ" width="26"}

We are thrilled to officially announce the launch of Conquer the Hill, an annual community event where we come together to walk up Tumamoc Hill as a symbol of healing, growth, and overcoming life‚Äôs challenges. Whether you‚Äôve faced trauma, domestic violence, PTSD, homelessness, or mental health struggles, this event is a chance to rise above it all‚Äîtogether.

### ![üóì](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f5d3/72.png){alt="üóì" width="22"} Date: November 3, 2024

### ![üìç](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f4cd/72.png){alt="üìç" width="18"} Location: Tumamoc Hill, Tucson, AZ

## How the Event Will Run This Year:

After our walk up Tumamoc Hill, we will gather at a separate venue to be determined, where we‚Äôll enjoy light food and beverages and listen to inspiring speakers share their stories of hope, resilience, and resources for moving forward. Stay tuned for the venue details!
